name: starter-healthcare-portal
description: Next.js 14 healthcare patient portal with appointments, health records, doctor profiles, multi-step booking, and department directory. Teal/cyan theme. TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, App Router.
postMessage:
MediCare Plus healthcare portal starter installed! Run:
1. npm install
2. npm run dev

Customize by editing lib/data.ts (doctors, appointments, records, departments) and replace placeholder-doctor.svg with real photos.
